text:
Oct 4
• Updated the sidebar layout for the selected location view. Figma Link
• Synced with Anagha and Navajyoth regarding updates to the User Role UI.
Next
• Continue improving the Questionnaire Builder UX.
• Review pending design board issues.

Nov 5
• Identified UX issues in the Questionnaire Builder.
• Updated the Sidebar and Home Page designs on the GitHub Design Board. ready for dev.
Next
• Continue improving the Questionnaire Builder UX.

Nov 06
• Worked on the Questionnaire Builder UX improvements.
• Updated the Inventory pages with a new sidebar layout.
Next:
• Continue work on the Questionnaire Builder UX improvements.

Nov 07
• Had a long discussion with Anagha regarding a long-pending multi-selector input issue and reviewed her proposed solution.
• Discussed the design roadmap and UX issues with Aravind.
• Continued work on the Questionnaire Builder UX.
Next:
• Complete Questionnaire Builder improvements.
• Start work on the Component Registry.
